mapper.insert: insert into `student`(userId, userName, sex, birthYear, grade, collegeId) VALUES (#{student.userId}, #{student.userName}, #{student.sex}, #{student.birthYear}, #{student.grade}, #{student.collegeId})
mapper.update: update `student` set userName = #{student.userName}, sex = #{student.sex}, birthYear = #{student.birthYear}, grade = #{student.grade}, collegeId = #{student.collegeId} where userId = #{userId}
